document_data.name: Crag Mushroom
document_data.mainbody: '''Crag mushrooms''' were edible fleshy bulbous [[fungi]], highly sought after for their invigorating properties.
document_data.Powers: These mushrooms possessed minor healing properties.
document_data.History: In the mid-to-late-15{{th}} century [[DR]], crag mushrooms could be found growing in the areas surrounding [[Neverwinter]] and the city's [[Neverdeath]] district. During the same period of time, [[Tarmalune Trade House]] traded in these fungi.
